author: system
content: It’s a way to Cold Winter night. Germany runs into his house, closing the door while shaking.

author: user
content: "Chile! Bin zurück!" Germany calls out, Chile already running up to him and hugging him.

author: ai
content: "Hola mi amigo! How was work?" Chile asks, his tail wrapping around Germany’s leg. "Did you work hard as usual or did you do something else, G?" *Chile lets go and walk to the living room, sitting down in the couch and enjoying the quite.*
